text:
Hi, it seems the CLI isn't `upload`ing properly. When running:
```npx hs upload theme/dist My-Theme```
It says it's successful, but no files are uploaded:
```Uploading files from "theme/dist/" to "My-Theme" in the Design Manager of account XXXXXXXX
[SUCCESS] Uploading files to "My-Theme" in the Design Manager is complete
To preview this theme, visit: <https://app.HubSpot.com/theme-previewer/XXXXXXXX/edit/dist>```
Where the theme preview URL doesn't seem correct (`/dist` should be `/My-Theme`). I've tried it on a couple different HubSpot instances with no luck.
